020import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
021import static org.junit.Assert.assertFalse;
022import static org.junit.Assert.assertNull;
023import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
024import static org.junit.Assert.fail;
025
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.Arrays;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Objects;
031import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.CellComparator;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.CompareOperator;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ExtendedCell;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseClassTestRule;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.KeyValue;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.KeyValueUtil;

054@Category({ FilterTests.class, MediumTests.class })
055public class TestFilterList {
056
057  @ClassRule
058  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
059    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestFilterList.class);
060
061  static final int MAX_PAGES = 2;
062
063  @Test
064  public void testAddFilter() throws Exception {
065    Filter filter1 = new FirstKeyOnlyFilter();
066    Filter filter2 = new FirstKeyOnlyFilter();
067
068    FilterList filterList = new FilterList(filter1, filter2);
069    filterList.addFilter(new FirstKeyOnlyFilter());
070
071    filterList = new FilterList(Arrays.asList(filter1, filter2));
072    filterList.addFilter(new FirstKeyOnlyFilter());
073
074    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter1, filter2);
075    filterList.addFilter(new FirstKeyOnlyFilter());
076
077    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, Arrays.asList(filter1, filter2));
078    filterList.addFilter(new FirstKeyOnlyFilter());
079
080    filterList.setReversed(false);
081    FirstKeyOnlyFilter f = new FirstKeyOnlyFilter();
082    f.setReversed(true);
083    try {
084      filterList.addFilter(f);
085      fail("The IllegalArgumentException should be thrown because the added filter is reversed");
086    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
087    }
088
089  }
090
091  @Test
092  public void testConstruction() {
093    FirstKeyOnlyFilter f1 = new FirstKeyOnlyFilter();
094    FirstKeyOnlyFilter f2 = new FirstKeyOnlyFilter();
095    f1.setReversed(true);
096    f2.setReversed(false);
097
098    try {
099      FilterList ff = new FilterList(f1, f2);
100      fail("The IllegalArgumentException should be thrown");
101    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
102    }
103
104    try {
105      FilterList ff = new FilterList(Arrays.asList(f1, f2));
106      fail("The IllegalArgumentException should be thrown because the added filter is reversed");
107    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
108    }
109
110    try {
111      FilterList ff = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, Arrays.asList(f1, f2));
112      fail("The IllegalArgumentException should be thrown because the added filter is reversed");
113    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
114    }
115
116    try {
117      FilterList ff = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, f1, f2);
118      fail("The IllegalArgumentException should be thrown because the added filter is reversed");
119    } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
120    }
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * Test "must pass one"
125   */
126  @Test
127  public void testMPONE() throws Exception {
128    mpOneTest(getFilterMPONE());
129  }
130
131  private Filter getFilterMPONE() {
132    List<Filter> filters = new ArrayList<>();
133    filters.add(new PageFilter(MAX_PAGES));
134    filters.add(new WhileMatchFilter(new PrefixFilter(Bytes.toBytes("yyy"))));
135    Filter filterMPONE = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filters);
136    return filterMPONE;
137  }
138
139  private void mpOneTest(Filter filterMPONE) throws Exception {
140    /*
141     * Filter must do all below steps: <ul> <li>{@link #reset()}</li> <li>{@link
142     * #filterAllRemaining()} -> true indicates scan is over, false, keep going on.</li> <li>{@link
143     * #filterRowKey(byte[],int,int)} -> true to drop this row, if false, we will also call</li>
144     * <li>{@link #filterCell(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.KeyValue)} -> true to drop this cell</li>
145     * <li>{@link #filterRow()} -> last chance to drop entire row based on the sequence of
146     * filterValue() calls. Eg: filter a row if it doesn't contain a specified column. </li> </ul>
147     */
148    filterMPONE.reset();
149    assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterAllRemaining());
150
151    /* Will pass both */
152    byte[] rowkey = Bytes.toBytes("yyyyyyyyy");
153    for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PAGES - 1; i++) {
154      assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(rowkey)));
155      KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(rowkey, rowkey, Bytes.toBytes(i), Bytes.toBytes(i));
156      assertTrue(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE == filterMPONE.filterCell(kv));
157      assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRow());
158    }
159
160    /* Only pass PageFilter */
161    rowkey = Bytes.toBytes("z");
162    assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(rowkey)));
163    KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(rowkey, rowkey, Bytes.toBytes(0), Bytes.toBytes(0));
164    assertTrue(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE == filterMPONE.filterCell(kv));
165    assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRow());
166
167    /* reach MAX_PAGES already, should filter any rows */
168    rowkey = Bytes.toBytes("yyy");
169    assertTrue(filterMPONE.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(rowkey)));
170    kv = new KeyValue(rowkey, rowkey, Bytes.toBytes(0), Bytes.toBytes(0));
171    assertFalse(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE == filterMPONE.filterCell(kv));
172    assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRow());
173
174    /* We should filter any row */
175    rowkey = Bytes.toBytes("z");
176    assertTrue(filterMPONE.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(rowkey)));
177    assertTrue(filterMPONE.filterAllRemaining());
178  }
179
180  /**
181   * Test "must pass all"
182   */
183  @Test
184  public void testMPALL() throws Exception {
185    mpAllTest(getMPALLFilter());
186  }
187
188  private Filter getMPALLFilter() {
189    List<Filter> filters = new ArrayList<>();
190    filters.add(new PageFilter(MAX_PAGES));
191    filters.add(new WhileMatchFilter(new PrefixFilter(Bytes.toBytes("yyy"))));
192    Filter filterMPALL = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filters);
193    return filterMPALL;
194  }
195
196  private void mpAllTest(Filter filterMPALL) throws Exception {
197    /*
198     * Filter must do all below steps: <ul> <li>{@link #reset()}</li> <li>{@link
199     * #filterAllRemaining()} -> true indicates scan is over, false, keep going on.</li> <li>{@link
200     * #filterRowKey(byte[],int,int)} -> true to drop this row, if false, we will also call</li>
201     * <li>{@link #filterCell(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.KeyValue)} -> true to drop this cell</li>
202     * <li>{@link #filterRow()} -> last chance to drop entire row based on the sequence of
203     * filterValue() calls. Eg: filter a row if it doesn't contain a specified column. </li> </ul>
204     */
205    filterMPALL.reset();
206    assertFalse(filterMPALL.filterAllRemaining());
207    byte[] rowkey = Bytes.toBytes("yyyyyyyyy");
208    for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PAGES - 1; i++) {
209      assertFalse(filterMPALL.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(rowkey)));
210      KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(rowkey, rowkey, Bytes.toBytes(i), Bytes.toBytes(i));
211      assertTrue(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE == filterMPALL.filterCell(kv));
212    }
213    filterMPALL.reset();
214    rowkey = Bytes.toBytes("z");
215    assertTrue(filterMPALL.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(rowkey)));
216    // Should fail here; row should be filtered out.
217    KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(rowkey, rowkey, rowkey, rowkey);
218    assertTrue(Filter.ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW == filterMPALL.filterCell(kv));
219  }
220
221  /**
222   * Test list ordering
223   */
224  @Test
225  public void testOrdering() throws Exception {
226    orderingTest(getOrderingFilter());
227  }
228
229  public Filter getOrderingFilter() {
230    List<Filter> filters = new ArrayList<>();
231    filters.add(new PrefixFilter(Bytes.toBytes("yyy")));
232    filters.add(new PageFilter(MAX_PAGES));
233    Filter filterMPONE = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filters);
234    return filterMPONE;
235  }
236
237  public void orderingTest(Filter filterMPONE) throws Exception {
238    /*
239     * Filter must do all below steps: <ul> <li>{@link #reset()}</li> <li>{@link
240     * #filterAllRemaining()} -> true indicates scan is over, false, keep going on.</li> <li>{@link
241     * #filterRowKey(byte[],int,int)} -> true to drop this row, if false, we will also call</li>
242     * <li>{@link #filterCell(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.KeyValue)} -> true to drop this key/value</li>
243     * <li>{@link #filterRow()} -> last chance to drop entire row based on the sequence of
244     * filterValue() calls. Eg: filter a row if it doesn't contain a specified column. </li> </ul>
245     */
246    filterMPONE.reset();
247    assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterAllRemaining());
248
249    /* We should be able to fill MAX_PAGES without incrementing page counter */
250    byte[] rowkey = Bytes.toBytes("yyyyyyyy");
251    for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PAGES; i++) {
252      assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(rowkey)));
253      KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(rowkey, rowkey, Bytes.toBytes(i), Bytes.toBytes(i));
254      assertTrue(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE == filterMPONE.filterCell(kv));
255      assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRow());
256    }
257
258    /* Now let's fill the page filter */
259    rowkey = Bytes.toBytes("xxxxxxx");
260    for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PAGES; i++) {
261      assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(rowkey)));
262      KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(rowkey, rowkey, Bytes.toBytes(i), Bytes.toBytes(i));
263      assertTrue(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE == filterMPONE.filterCell(kv));
264      assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRow());
265    }
266
267    /* We should still be able to include even though page filter is at max */
268    rowkey = Bytes.toBytes("yyy");
269    for (int i = 0; i < MAX_PAGES; i++) {
270      assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(rowkey)));
271      KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(rowkey, rowkey, Bytes.toBytes(i), Bytes.toBytes(i));
272      assertTrue(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE == filterMPONE.filterCell(kv));
273      assertFalse(filterMPONE.filterRow());
274    }
275  }
276
277  /**
278   * When we do a "MUST_PASS_ONE" (a logical 'OR') of the above two filters we expect to get the
279   * same result as the 'prefix' only result.
280   */
281  @Test
282  public void testFilterListTwoFiltersMustPassOne() throws Exception {
283    byte[] r1 = Bytes.toBytes("Row1");
284    byte[] r11 = Bytes.toBytes("Row11");
285    byte[] r2 = Bytes.toBytes("Row2");
286
287    FilterList flist = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE);
288    flist.addFilter(new PrefixFilter(r1));
289    flist.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r1));
290    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, flist.filterCell(new KeyValue(r1, r1, r1)));
291    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, flist.filterCell(new KeyValue(r11, r11, r11)));
292
293    flist.reset();
294    flist.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r2));
295    assertEquals(ReturnCode.SKIP, flist.filterCell(new KeyValue(r2, r2, r2)));
296
297    flist = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE);
298    flist.addFilter(new AlwaysNextColFilter());
299    flist.addFilter(new PrefixFilter(r1));
300    flist.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r1));
301    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, flist.filterCell(new KeyValue(r1, r1, r1)));
302    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, flist.filterCell(new KeyValue(r11, r11, r11)));
303
304    flist.reset();
305    flist.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r2));
306    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, flist.filterCell(new KeyValue(r2, r2, r2)));
307  }
308
309  /**
310   * When we do a "MUST_PASS_ONE" (a logical 'OR') of the two filters we expect to get the same
311   * result as the inclusive stop result.
312   */
313  @Test
314  public void testFilterListWithInclusiveStopFilterMustPassOne() throws Exception {
315    byte[] r1 = Bytes.toBytes("Row1");
316    byte[] r11 = Bytes.toBytes("Row11");
317    byte[] r2 = Bytes.toBytes("Row2");
318
319    FilterList flist = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE);
320    flist.addFilter(new AlwaysNextColFilter());
321    flist.addFilter(new InclusiveStopFilter(r1));
322    flist.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r1));
323    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, flist.filterCell(new KeyValue(r1, r1, r1)));
324    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, flist.filterCell(new KeyValue(r11, r11, r11)));
325
326    flist.reset();
327    flist.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r2));
328    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, flist.filterCell(new KeyValue(r2, r2, r2)));
329  }
330
331  public static class AlwaysNextColFilter extends FilterBase {
332    public AlwaysNextColFilter() {
333      super();
334    }
335
336    @Override
337    public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell v) {
338      return ReturnCode.NEXT_COL;
339    }
340
341    public static AlwaysNextColFilter parseFrom(final byte[] pbBytes)
342      throws DeserializationException {
343      return new AlwaysNextColFilter();
344    }
345  }
346
347  /**
348   * Test serialization
349   */
350  @Test
351  public void testSerialization() throws Exception {
352    List<Filter> filters = new ArrayList<>();
353    filters.add(new PageFilter(MAX_PAGES));
354    filters.add(new WhileMatchFilter(new PrefixFilter(Bytes.toBytes("yyy"))));
355    Filter filterMPALL = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filters);
356
357    // Decompose filterMPALL to bytes.
358    byte[] buffer = filterMPALL.toByteArray();
359
360    // Recompose filterMPALL.
361    FilterList newFilter = FilterList.parseFrom(buffer);
362
363    // Run tests
364    mpOneTest(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(getFilterMPONE())));
365    mpAllTest(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(getMPALLFilter())));
366    orderingTest(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(ProtobufUtil.toFilter(getOrderingFilter())));
367  }
368
369  /**
370   * Test filterCell logic.
371   */
372  @Test
373  public void testFilterCell() throws Exception {
374    Filter includeFilter = new FilterBase() {
375      @Override
376      public Filter.ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell v) {
377        return Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE;
378      }
379    };
380
381    Filter alternateFilter = new FilterBase() {
382      boolean returnInclude = true;
383
384      @Override
385      public Filter.ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell v) {
386        Filter.ReturnCode returnCode =
387          returnInclude ? Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE : Filter.ReturnCode.SKIP;
388        returnInclude = !returnInclude;
389        return returnCode;
390      }
391    };
392
393    Filter alternateIncludeFilter = new FilterBase() {
394      boolean returnIncludeOnly = false;
395
396      @Override
397      public Filter.ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell v) {
398        Filter.ReturnCode returnCode =
399          returnIncludeOnly ? Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE : Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL;
400        returnIncludeOnly = !returnIncludeOnly;
401        return returnCode;
402      }
403    };
404
405    // Check must pass one filter.
406    FilterList mpOnefilterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE,
407      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { includeFilter, alternateIncludeFilter, alternateFilter }));
408    // INCLUDE, INCLUDE, INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL.
409    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, mpOnefilterList.filterCell(null));
410    // INCLUDE, SKIP, INCLUDE.
411    assertEquals(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE, mpOnefilterList.filterCell(null));
412
413    // Check must pass all filter.
414    FilterList mpAllfilterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL,
415      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { includeFilter, alternateIncludeFilter, alternateFilter }));
416    // INCLUDE, INCLUDE, INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL.
417    assertEquals(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL, mpAllfilterList.filterCell(null));
418    // INCLUDE, SKIP, INCLUDE.
419    assertEquals(Filter.ReturnCode.SKIP, mpAllfilterList.filterCell(null));
420  }
421
422  /**
423   * Test pass-thru of hints.
424   */
425  @Test
426  public void testHintPassThru() throws Exception {
427
428    final KeyValue minKeyValue = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes(0L), null, null);
429    final KeyValue maxKeyValue = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes(Long.MAX_VALUE), null, null);
430
431    Filter filterNoHint = new FilterBase() {
432      @Override
433      public byte[] toByteArray() {
434        return null;
435      }
436
437      @Override
438      public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell ignored) throws IOException {
439        return ReturnCode.INCLUDE;
440      }
441    };
442
443    Filter filterMinHint = new FilterBase() {
444      @Override
445      public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell ignored) {
446        return ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT;
447      }
448
449      @Override
450      public Cell getNextCellHint(Cell currentKV) {
451        return minKeyValue;
452      }
453
454      @Override
455      public byte[] toByteArray() {
456        return null;
457      }
458    };
459
460    Filter filterMaxHint = new FilterBase() {
461      @Override
462      public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell ignored) {
463        return ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT;
464      }
465
466      @Override
467      public Cell getNextCellHint(Cell cell) {
468        return new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes(Long.MAX_VALUE), null, null);
469      }
470
471      @Override
472      public byte[] toByteArray() {
473        return null;
474      }
475    };
476
477    CellComparator comparator = CellComparator.getInstance();
478    // MUST PASS ONE
479
480    // Should take the min if given two hints
481    FilterList filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE,
482      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { filterMinHint, filterMaxHint }));
483    assertEquals(0, comparator.compare(filterList.getNextCellHint(null), minKeyValue));
484
485    // Should have no hint if any filter has no hint
486    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE,
487      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { filterMinHint, filterMaxHint, filterNoHint }));
488    assertNull(filterList.getNextCellHint(null));
489    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE,
490      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { filterNoHint, filterMaxHint }));
491    assertNull(filterList.getNextCellHint(null));
492
493    // Should give max hint if its the only one
494    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE,
495      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { filterMaxHint, filterMaxHint }));
496    assertEquals(0, comparator.compare(filterList.getNextCellHint(null), maxKeyValue));
497
498    // MUST PASS ALL
499
500    // Should take the first hint
501    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL,
502      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { filterMinHint, filterMaxHint }));
503    filterList.filterCell(null);
504    assertEquals(0, comparator.compare(filterList.getNextCellHint(null), minKeyValue));
505
506    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL,
507      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { filterMaxHint, filterMinHint }));
508    filterList.filterCell(null);
509    assertEquals(0, comparator.compare(filterList.getNextCellHint(null), maxKeyValue));
510
511    // Should have first hint even if a filter has no hint
512    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL,
513      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { filterNoHint, filterMinHint, filterMaxHint }));
514    filterList.filterCell(null);
515    assertEquals(0, comparator.compare(filterList.getNextCellHint(null), minKeyValue));
516    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL,
517      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { filterNoHint, filterMaxHint }));
518    filterList.filterCell(null);
519    assertEquals(0, comparator.compare(filterList.getNextCellHint(null), maxKeyValue));
520    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL,
521      Arrays.asList(new Filter[] { filterNoHint, filterMinHint }));
522    filterList.filterCell(null);
523    assertEquals(0, comparator.compare(filterList.getNextCellHint(null), minKeyValue));
524  }
525
526  /**
527   * Tests the behavior of transform() in a hierarchical filter. transform() only applies after a
528   * filterCell() whose return-code includes the KeyValue. Lazy evaluation of AND
529   */
530  @Test
531  public void testTransformMPO() throws Exception {
532    // Apply the following filter:
533    // (family=fam AND qualifier=qual1 AND KeyOnlyFilter)
534    // OR (family=fam AND qualifier=qual2)
535    final FilterList flist = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE,
536      Lists.<Filter> newArrayList(
537        new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL,
538          Lists.<Filter> newArrayList(
539            new FamilyFilter(CompareOperator.EQUAL, new BinaryComparator(Bytes.toBytes("fam"))),
540            new QualifierFilter(CompareOperator.EQUAL,
541              new BinaryComparator(Bytes.toBytes("qual1"))),
542            new KeyOnlyFilter())),
543        new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL,
544          Lists.<Filter> newArrayList(
545            new FamilyFilter(CompareOperator.EQUAL, new BinaryComparator(Bytes.toBytes("fam"))),
546            new QualifierFilter(CompareOperator.EQUAL,
547              new BinaryComparator(Bytes.toBytes("qual2")))))));
548
549    final KeyValue kvQual1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"),
550      Bytes.toBytes("qual1"), Bytes.toBytes("value"));
551    final KeyValue kvQual2 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"),
552      Bytes.toBytes("qual2"), Bytes.toBytes("value"));
553    final KeyValue kvQual3 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"),
554      Bytes.toBytes("qual3"), Bytes.toBytes("value"));
555
556    // Value for fam:qual1 should be stripped:
557    assertEquals(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE, flist.filterCell(kvQual1));
558    final KeyValue transformedQual1 =
559      KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue((ExtendedCell) flist.transformCell(kvQual1));
560    assertEquals(0, transformedQual1.getValueLength());
561
562    // Value for fam:qual2 should not be stripped:
563    assertEquals(Filter.ReturnCode.INCLUDE, flist.filterCell(kvQual2));
564    final KeyValue transformedQual2 =
565      KeyValueUtil.ensureKeyValue((ExtendedCell) flist.transformCell(kvQual2));
566    assertEquals("value", Bytes.toString(transformedQual2.getValueArray(),
567      transformedQual2.getValueOffset(), transformedQual2.getValueLength()));
568
569    // Other keys should be skipped:
570    assertEquals(Filter.ReturnCode.SKIP, flist.filterCell(kvQual3));
571  }
572
573  @Test
574  public void testWithMultiVersionsInSameRow() throws Exception {
575    FilterList filterList01 =
576      new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, new ColumnPaginationFilter(1, 0));
577
578    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("qual"),
579      1, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
580    KeyValue kv2 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("qual"),
581      2, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
582    KeyValue kv3 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("qual"),
583      3, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
584
585    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL, filterList01.filterCell(kv1));
586    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, filterList01.filterCell(kv2));
587    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, filterList01.filterCell(kv3));
588
589    FilterList filterList11 =
590      new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, new ColumnPaginationFilter(1, 1));
591
592    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, filterList11.filterCell(kv1));
593    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, filterList11.filterCell(kv2));
594    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, filterList11.filterCell(kv3));
595  }
596
597  @Test
598  public void testMPONEWithSeekNextUsingHint() throws Exception {
599    byte[] col = Bytes.toBytes("c");
600    FilterList filterList =
601      new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, new ColumnPaginationFilter(1, col));
602
603    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 1,
604      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
605    KeyValue kv2 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("b"), 2,
606      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
607    KeyValue kv3 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("c"), 3,
608      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
609    KeyValue kv4 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("c"), 4,
610      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
611
612    assertEquals(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
613    assertEquals(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, filterList.filterCell(kv2));
614    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(kv3));
615    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(kv4));
616  }
617
618  private static class MockFilter extends FilterBase {
619    private ReturnCode targetRetCode;
620    public boolean didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
621
622    public MockFilter(ReturnCode targetRetCode) {
623      this.targetRetCode = targetRetCode;
624    }
625
626    @Override
627    public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell v) throws IOException {
628      this.didCellPassToTheFilter = true;
629      return targetRetCode;
630    }
631
632    @Override
633    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
634      if (obj == null || !(obj instanceof MockFilter)) {
635        return false;
636      }
637      if (obj == this) {
638        return true;
639      }
640      MockFilter f = (MockFilter) obj;
641      return this.targetRetCode.equals(f.targetRetCode);
642    }
643
644    @Override
645    public int hashCode() {
646      return Objects.hash(this.targetRetCode);
647    }
648  }
649
650  private static class HintingMockFilter extends MockFilter implements HintingFilter {
651    public HintingMockFilter(ReturnCode targetRetCode) {
652      super(targetRetCode);
653    }
654  }
655
656  @Test
657  public void testShouldPassCurrentCellToFilter() throws IOException {
658    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 1,
659      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
660    KeyValue kv2 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 2,
661      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
662    KeyValue kv3 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("b"), 3,
663      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
664    KeyValue kv4 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row1"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("c"), 4,
665      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
666
667    MockFilter mockFilter = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL);
668    FilterList filter = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, mockFilter);
669
670    filter.filterCell(kv1);
671    assertTrue(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
672
673    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
674    filter.filterCell(kv2);
675    assertFalse(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
676
677    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
678    filter.filterCell(kv3);
679    assertTrue(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
680
681    mockFilter = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL);
682    filter = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, mockFilter);
683
684    filter.filterCell(kv1);
685    assertTrue(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
686
687    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
688    filter.filterCell(kv2);
689    assertFalse(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
690
691    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
692    filter.filterCell(kv3);
693    assertTrue(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
694
695    mockFilter = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW);
696    filter = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, mockFilter);
697    filter.filterCell(kv1);
698    assertTrue(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
699
700    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
701    filter.filterCell(kv2);
702    assertFalse(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
703
704    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
705    filter.filterCell(kv3);
706    assertFalse(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
707
708    filter.reset();
709    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
710    filter.filterCell(kv4);
711    assertTrue(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
712
713    mockFilter = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_ROW);
714    filter = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, mockFilter);
715    filter.filterCell(kv1);
716    assertTrue(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
717
718    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
719    filter.filterCell(kv2);
720    assertFalse(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
721
722    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
723    filter.filterCell(kv3);
724    assertFalse(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
725
726    filter.reset();
727    mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter = false;
728    filter.filterCell(kv4);
729    assertTrue(mockFilter.didCellPassToTheFilter);
730  }
731
732  @Test
733  public void testTheMaximalRule() throws IOException {
734    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 1,
735      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
736    MockFilter filter1 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE);
737    MockFilter filter2 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL);
738    MockFilter filter3 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_ROW);
739    MockFilter filter4 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL);
740    MockFilter filter5 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.SKIP);
741    MockFilter filter6 = new HintingMockFilter(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT);
742    MockFilter filter7 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW);
743
744    FilterList filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter1, filter2);
745    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
746
747    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter2, filter3);
748    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_ROW, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
749
750    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter4, filter5, filter6);
751    assertEquals(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
752
753    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter4, filter6);
754    assertEquals(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
755
756    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter3, filter1);
757    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_ROW, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
758
759    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter3, filter2, filter1, filter5);
760    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
761
762    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter2,
763      new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter3, filter4));
764    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
765
766    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter3, filter7);
767    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
768  }
769
770  @Test
771  public void testTheMinimalRule() throws IOException {
772    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 1,
773      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
774    MockFilter filter1 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE);
775    MockFilter filter2 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL);
776    MockFilter filter3 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_ROW);
777    MockFilter filter4 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL);
778    MockFilter filter5 = new MockFilter(ReturnCode.SKIP);
779    MockFilter filter6 = new HintingMockFilter(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT);
780    FilterList filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter1, filter2);
781    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
782
783    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter2, filter3);
784    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
785
786    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter4, filter5, filter6);
787    assertEquals(ReturnCode.SKIP, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
788
789    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter4, filter6);
790    assertEquals(ReturnCode.SKIP, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
791
792    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter3, filter1);
793    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
794
795    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter3, filter2, filter1, filter5);
796    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
797
798    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter2,
799      new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter3, filter4));
800    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
801
802    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter2,
803      new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter3, filter4));
804    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
805
806    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter6, filter6);
807    assertEquals(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
808  }
809
810  static class MockSeekHintFilter extends FilterBase {
811    private Cell returnCell;
812
813    public MockSeekHintFilter(Cell returnCell) {
814      this.returnCell = returnCell;
815    }
816
817    @Override
818    public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell v) throws IOException {
819      return ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT;
820    }
821
822    @Override
823    public Cell getNextCellHint(Cell currentCell) throws IOException {
824      return this.returnCell;
825    }
826
827    @Override
828    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
829      if (obj == null || !(obj instanceof MockSeekHintFilter)) {
830        return false;
831      }
832      if (obj == this) {
833        return true;
834      }
835      MockSeekHintFilter f = (MockSeekHintFilter) obj;
836      return this.returnCell.equals(f.returnCell);
837    }
838
839    @Override
840    public int hashCode() {
841      return Objects.hash(this.returnCell);
842    }
843  }

845  @Test
846  public void testReversedFilterListWithMockSeekHintFilter() throws IOException {
847    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row1"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 1,
848      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
849    KeyValue kv2 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row2"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 1,
850      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
851    KeyValue kv3 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row3"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 1,
852      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
853    Filter filter1 = new MockSeekHintFilter(kv1);
854    filter1.setReversed(true);
855    Filter filter2 = new MockSeekHintFilter(kv2);
856    filter2.setReversed(true);
857    Filter filter3 = new MockSeekHintFilter(kv3);
858    filter3.setReversed(true);
859
860    FilterList filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE);
861    filterList.setReversed(true);
862    filterList.addFilter(filter1);
863    filterList.addFilter(filter2);
864    filterList.addFilter(filter3);
865
866    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
867    Assert.assertEquals(kv3, filterList.getNextCellHint(kv1));
868
869    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL);
870    filterList.setReversed(true);
871    filterList.addFilter(filter1);
872    filterList.addFilter(filter2);
873    filterList.addFilter(filter3);
874
875    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
876    Assert.assertEquals(kv1, filterList.getNextCellHint(kv1));
877  }
878
879  @Test
880  public void testReversedFilterListWithOR() throws IOException {
881    byte[] r22 = Bytes.toBytes("Row22");
882    byte[] r2 = Bytes.toBytes("Row2");
883    byte[] r1 = Bytes.toBytes("Row1");
884
885    FilterList filterList = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE);
886    filterList.setReversed(true);
887    PrefixFilter prefixFilter = new PrefixFilter(r2);
888    prefixFilter.setReversed(true);
889    filterList.addFilter(prefixFilter);
890    filterList.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r22));
891    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(new KeyValue(r22, r22, r22)));
892    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(new KeyValue(r2, r2, r2)));
893
894    filterList.reset();
895    filterList.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r1));
896    assertEquals(ReturnCode.SKIP, filterList.filterCell(new KeyValue(r1, r1, r1)));
897
898    filterList = new FilterList(FilterList.Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE);
899    filterList.setReversed(true);
900    AlwaysNextColFilter alwaysNextColFilter = new AlwaysNextColFilter();
901    alwaysNextColFilter.setReversed(true);
902    prefixFilter = new PrefixFilter(r2);
903    prefixFilter.setReversed(true);
904    filterList.addFilter(alwaysNextColFilter);
905    filterList.addFilter(prefixFilter);
906    filterList.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r22));
907    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(new KeyValue(r22, r22, r22)));
908    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(new KeyValue(r2, r2, r2)));
909
910    filterList.reset();
911    filterList.filterRowKey(KeyValueUtil.createFirstOnRow(r1));
912    assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(new KeyValue(r1, r1, r1)));
913  }
914
915  @Test
916  public void testKeyOnlyFilterTransformCell() throws IOException {
917    Cell c;
918    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("column1"),
919      1, Bytes.toBytes("value1"));
920    KeyValue kv2 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("column1"),
921      2, Bytes.toBytes("value2"));
922
923    Filter filter1 = new SingleColumnValueFilter(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("column1"),
924      CompareOperator.EQUAL, Bytes.toBytes("value1"));
925    Filter filter2 = new SingleColumnValueFilter(Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("column1"),
926      CompareOperator.EQUAL, Bytes.toBytes("value2"));
927    FilterList internalFilterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter1, filter2);
928
929    FilterList keyOnlyFilterFirst =
930      new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, new KeyOnlyFilter(), internalFilterList);
931
932    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, keyOnlyFilterFirst.filterCell(kv1));
933    c = keyOnlyFilterFirst.transformCell(kv1);
934    assertEquals(0, c.getValueLength());
935    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, keyOnlyFilterFirst.filterCell(kv2));
936    c = keyOnlyFilterFirst.transformCell(kv2);
937    assertEquals(0, c.getValueLength());
938
939    internalFilterList.reset();
940    FilterList keyOnlyFilterLast =
941      new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, new KeyOnlyFilter(), internalFilterList);
942    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, keyOnlyFilterLast.filterCell(kv1));
943    c = keyOnlyFilterLast.transformCell(kv1);
944    assertEquals(0, c.getValueLength());
945    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, keyOnlyFilterLast.filterCell(kv2));
946    c = keyOnlyFilterLast.transformCell(kv2);
947    assertEquals(0, c.getValueLength());
948  }
949
950  @Test
951  public void testEmptyFilterListTransformCell() throws IOException {
952    KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("column1"),
953      1, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
954    FilterList filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL);
955    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(kv));
956    assertEquals(kv, filterList.transformCell(kv));
957
958    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE);
959    assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(kv));
960    assertEquals(kv, filterList.transformCell(kv));
961  }

963  private static class MockNextRowFilter extends FilterBase {
964    private int hitCount = 0;
965
966    @Override
967    public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell v) throws IOException {
968      hitCount++;
969      return ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW;
970    }
971
972    public int getHitCount() {
973      return hitCount;
974    }
975  }

977  @Test
978  public void testRowCountFilter() throws IOException {
979    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam1"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 1,
980      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
981    KeyValue kv2 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("fam2"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 2,
982      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
983    MockNextRowFilter mockNextRowFilter = new MockNextRowFilter();
984    FilterList filter = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, mockNextRowFilter);
985    filter.filterCell(kv1);
986    filter.filterCell(kv2);
987    assertEquals(2, mockNextRowFilter.getHitCount());
988  }
989
990  private static class TransformFilter extends FilterBase {
991    private ReturnCode targetRetCode;
992    private boolean transformed = false;
993
994    public TransformFilter(ReturnCode targetRetCode) {
995      this.targetRetCode = targetRetCode;
996    }
997
998    @Override
999    public ReturnCode filterCell(final Cell v) throws IOException {
1000      return targetRetCode;
1001    }
1002
1003    @Override
1004    public Cell transformCell(Cell c) throws IOException {
1005      transformed = true;
1006      return super.transformCell(c);
1007    }
1008
1009    public boolean getTransformed() {
1010      return this.transformed;
1011    }
1012
1013    @Override
1014    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
1015      if (!(obj instanceof TransformFilter)) {
1016        return false;
1017      }
1018      if (obj == this) {
1019        return true;
1020      }
1021      TransformFilter f = (TransformFilter) obj;
1022      return this.targetRetCode.equals(f.targetRetCode);
1023    }
1024
1025    @Override
1026    public int hashCode() {
1027      return Objects.hash(this.targetRetCode);
1028    }
1029  }
1030
1031  @Test
1032  public void testTransformCell() throws IOException {
1033    KeyValue kv = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row"), Bytes.toBytes("cf"), Bytes.toBytes("column1"),
1034      1, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
1035
1036    // case MUST_PASS_ONE
1037    TransformFilter filter1 = new TransformFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE);
1038    TransformFilter filter2 = new TransformFilter(ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW);
1039    TransformFilter filter3 = new TransformFilter(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT);
1040    FilterList filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, filter1, filter2, filter3);
1041    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(kv));
1042    Assert.assertEquals(kv, filterList.transformCell(kv));
1043    Assert.assertEquals(true, filter1.getTransformed());
1044    Assert.assertEquals(false, filter2.getTransformed());
1045    Assert.assertEquals(false, filter3.getTransformed());
1046
1047    // case MUST_PASS_ALL
1048    filter1 = new TransformFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE);
1049    filter2 = new TransformFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_ROW);
1050    filter3 = new TransformFilter(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL);
1051    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ALL, filter1, filter2, filter3);
1052
1053    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_ROW, filterList.filterCell(kv));
1054    Assert.assertEquals(kv, filterList.transformCell(kv));
1055    Assert.assertEquals(true, filter1.getTransformed());
1056    Assert.assertEquals(true, filter2.getTransformed());
1057    Assert.assertEquals(true, filter3.getTransformed());
1058  }
1059
1060  @Test
1061  public void testFilterListWithORWhenPassingCellMismatchPreviousRC() throws IOException {
1062    // Mainly test FilterListWithOR#calculateReturnCodeByPrevCellAndRC method with two sub-filters.
1063    KeyValue kv1 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row1"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"),
1064      100, Bytes.toBytes("value"));
1065    KeyValue kv2 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row1"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 99,
1066      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
1067    KeyValue kv3 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row1"), Bytes.toBytes("fam"), Bytes.toBytes("b"), 1,
1068      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
1069    KeyValue kv4 = new KeyValue(Bytes.toBytes("row1"), Bytes.toBytes("fan"), Bytes.toBytes("a"), 1,
1070      Bytes.toBytes("value"));
1071    Filter subFilter1 = Mockito.mock(FilterBase.class);
1072    Mockito.when(subFilter1.filterCell(kv1)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL);
1073    Mockito.when(subFilter1.filterCell(kv2)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL);
1074    Mockito.when(subFilter1.filterCell(kv3)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL);
1075    Mockito.when(subFilter1.filterCell(kv4)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL);
1076
1077    Filter subFilter2 = Mockito.mock(FilterBase.class);
1078    Mockito.when(subFilter2.filterCell(kv1)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.SKIP);
1079    Mockito.when(subFilter2.filterCell(kv2)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW);
1080    Mockito.when(subFilter2.filterCell(kv3)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW);
1081    Mockito.when(subFilter2.filterCell(kv4)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_SEEK_NEXT_ROW);
1082
1083    Filter filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, subFilter1, subFilter2);
1084    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
1085    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(kv2));
1086    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(kv3));
1087    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.INCLUDE_AND_NEXT_COL, filterList.filterCell(kv4));
1088
1089    // One sub-filter will filterAllRemaining but other sub-filter will return SEEK_HINT
1090    subFilter1 = Mockito.mock(FilterBase.class);
1091    Mockito.when(subFilter1.filterAllRemaining()).thenReturn(true);
1092    Mockito.when(subFilter1.filterCell(kv1)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.NEXT_ROW);
1093
1094    subFilter2 = Mockito.mock(FilterBase.class);
1095    Mockito.when(subFilter2.filterCell(kv1)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT);
1096    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, subFilter1, subFilter2);
1097    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
1098
1099    // Two sub-filter returns SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, then we should return SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT.
1100    subFilter1 = Mockito.mock(FilterBase.class);
1101    Mockito.when(subFilter1.filterCell(kv1)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT);
1102
1103    subFilter2 = Mockito.mock(FilterBase.class);
1104    Mockito.when(subFilter2.filterCell(kv1)).thenReturn(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT);
1105    filterList = new FilterList(Operator.MUST_PASS_ONE, subFilter1, subFilter2);
1106    Assert.assertEquals(ReturnCode.SEEK_NEXT_USING_HINT, filterList.filterCell(kv1));
1107  }
1108}
